overview:
As Vice President of Video Production and Media Services, Bobby oversees all video production for EQAL’s Branded Entertainment, Celebrity Influencer and Owned and Operated properties. With years of experience in feature film and television development and countless production hours to date, Bobby has worked with some of the biggest studios, networks and production companies in the entertainment industry and is committed to creating inventive, successful and lasting partnerships through original video content. Shortly after joining the EQAL team in July 2010, he was named Director of Branded Content and produced EQAL’s award winning interactive community, Real Women of Philadelphia (Kraft Foods / Paula Deen) and The Last Comic Sitting (Clorox / Sherri Shepherd). Bobby continues to work closely with all of EQAL’s high profile partners.

Bobby graduated with a degree in Film & Media Arts from Temple University and moved to Los Angeles from Philadelphia in 2006.

relationships.title: VP, Video Production and Media Services
